profile.summary: A resourceful and self-motivated web developer with 6 years experience in delivering software projects to extremely high standards. Proven skills through working well within a close team while using initiative for problem solving and ensuring errors are corrected. Possesses exemplary planning skills and accustomed to operating under considerable pressure, remaining calm and effective and prioritizing wisely.

duties.description: Delivering a complete front end application, Write reusable code (with documentation) to a standard which makes it quick and easy to maintain the code in the future
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability
Cooperating with the back-end developer in the process of building the RESTful API
Help other developers in reviewing pull requests to educate each other to write better code and understand business problems.
Technology/ies Used: Angular10, AngularJS, JIRA, XAMPP, Cakephp
RESTful API development / Frontend development

Spent most of your time developing REST APIs and improving existing API performance. Writing unit tests with full code coverage for the code that has been written, peer reviewing code and unit tests of peers and contributing to design and technical discussions.
Worked with AngularJS, Material, Typescript on frontend development.
Technology/ies Used: Angular10, AngularJS, JIRA, XAMPP, Cakephp
Frontend development
Continuous enhancement of the frontend experience on our ecommerce global website platform.
Contribute to ongoing process and procedures documentation.
Ensure the technical feasibility and best practices of UX/UI designs, with a focus on consistency and usability.
Cross-browser standards and testing for both desktop and mobile experiences.
Relentlessly optimizing our site for page speed and user experience.
Technology/ies Used: VueJS, Vuex, JIRA
Frontend development
Plan and design UI/UX
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Transforming layout designs into static websites.
Browser testing and debugging
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Creating client-side validation and security.
Maintain and enhance existing websites.
Technology/ies Used: VueJS, Vuex, JIRA, Codeigniter
Responsible for working on a range of projects such as kiosk based applications, websites, mobile application controls for various clients here in Singapore.
Frontend development
Technology/ies Used: VanillaJS, jquery
Assisted senior web developers by supporting design and coding
Developed and maintained the front end functionality of our website
Technology/ies Used: VanillaJS, jquery, PHP

qualifications.description: Extensive web development experience using JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, CSS, JSON and AJAX
Experience of using JavaScript libraries such as VueJS, ReactJS
Experience in developing interactive data visualisations
Experience with UI Frameworks such as Tailwind, Bootstrap
Experience in building single page web apps
Knowledge of Object Oriented development methodologies
